column17:
Nike Men Black-Blue Floaters :
Nike floaters in black and blue combination are recommended for those who have style as well as comfort in mind. Ideal for the summer months these floaters from Nike with phylon upper and rubber insole are sure to last long. Featuring velcro upper the straps of these floaters can be easily adjusted according to the comfort requirement. Team up these floaters with jeans or shorts and make the ultimate style statement.
